attributes.action: Cut knife crime, give the teenagers something to do, bring back national service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Teenagers,Alcohol, antisocial behaviour, knife crime,guns,  stabbings, gangs,car crime,  nothing to do, boredom,no disipline, no respect? bring back national service!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
